title: ip issue
body:
hey guys 

was wandering if anyone could help im slowly lvling a smurf account and i brought some ip win boosts and i was sitting 6669ip and and then i won 2 games so i should of gotten a total of 647ip from those 2 wins but i didnt i only went from 6669 to 6908 anyone know how to get the remainder of my ip or something please help

replies.body:
Hey there,

Unless the post-game screen and your match history stated a different amount of IP than that which you received then I don't see an issue here.

IP gain is determined by many factors and is different every match, you will rarely gain the same amount of IP each game thus predicting IP amounts gained would be impossible.

If your issue is a discrepancy between the amount received and amount displayed in post-game/match history please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support as they're the only ones who can assist you with account related issues.
